You do not have any accessibility related applications installed.

You can download a screen reader for your device from Android Market.

Click OK to install the screen reader.

This accessibility service may be able to collect all the text you type, including personal data credit card numbers except passwords. It may also log your user interface interactions. It comes from the application %1$s. Use this accessibility service?

USB debugging is intended for development purposes only. It can be used to copy data between your computer and your device, install applications on your device without notification, and read log data.

1.Limit number of background apps. \n2.Unless under bright light, there is no need for maximum brightness. \n3.Consider activating Flight Mode at night.
Disable mobile networks such as GPRS and 3G.
Disable syncing of contacts, mail, etc
Reduce power draw and data charges.
Screen brightness is set to minimum. Can drastically decrease power draw.
May reduce power draw from rogue applications when locking the screen.
Reduce screen timeout interval to minimum. May help with battery life.
Vibrations do not consume much power under normal usage.
Live Wallpapers are significant sources of power draw and may cause system lag.

When locating, accurate to street level (uncheck to conserve battery)
Connect at least four dots.\n \nTouch “Next” when you’re ready to draw your own pattern.

Protect your phone from unauthorized use by creating a personal screen unlock pattern. 

1 On the next screen, watch while an example pattern is drawn. 

2 When ready, draw your own personal unlock pattern. Experiment with different patterns but connect at least four dots. 

3 Redraw your pattern to confirm. 

Ready to start? Touch “Next”. 

To leave your phone unprotected, touch “Cancel”.
Play sounds when locking and unlocking the screen
Play sounds when locking and unlocking the screen
Password must contain at least one letter
Password must contain at least one digit
Password must contain at least one symbol
PIN can be no longer than %d digits
Password must be at least %d characters
PIN can be no longer than %d digits
PIN must be at least %d characters
Connect at least %d dots. Try again:
Must draw pattern to unlock screen
How to draw an unlock pattern

This will erase all data from your phone, including:

Your Google account

System and application data and settings

Downloaded applications
It will not erase:

Current system software and bundled applications

SD card files, such as music or photos
No reset was performed because the System Clear service is not available.
Erase all of your personal information and any downloaded applications? It is impossible to reverse this action!
You must draw your unlock pattern to confirm a phone reset.
This action will erase the SD card in the phone. You will lose ALL data on the card!
Format SD card, erasing all your media? Action cannot be reversed!
You must draw your unlock pattern to confirm an SD card format.
Erases all data on the SD card
